); } function handleEditAvatarClick() { const popupAvatar = document.querySelector('.popup_avatar'); popupAvatar.classList.add('.popup_opened'); } function handleEditProfileClick() { const popupProfile = document.querySelector('.popup_profile'); popupProfile.classList.add('.popup_opened'); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { const popupCard = document.querySelector('.popup_card'); popupCard.classList.add('.popup_opened'); } export default Main;
